Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix voice cloning with enhanced diagnostics and error handling

This update adds comprehensive logging and validation to diagnose and fix the voice cloning issue where voice samples weren''t being properly passed to the TTS engine.

Changes:
- Enhanced voice sample download with format validation and detailed logging
- Pre-validation check to ensure voice sample URL is accessible before processing
- Comprehensive TTS job creation and polling logs with clear error messages
- Better frontend error messages with user-friendly guidance
- Added deployment guide and helper scripts

The enhanced diagnostics will help identify whether the issue is:
1. Voice sample accessibility \(storage bucket permissions\)
2. Base64 encoding/transmission
3. RunPod worker configuration
